text.text_translated: The two men looked towards the northern end of the property, which stretched as far as the eye could see. From where they stood, even the fences were hardly visible. However bored and rebellious a teenage boy might get, it was not possible to escape on foot. Sam looked at the biggest of the horses, which was kicking the ground with its heavy hooves. He wondered if the boy could ride, because a good rider could get into a lot of trouble out here, miles away from anyone. But maybe there was even more trouble for someone who knew nothing about horses and wanted to get away from his father.
